Tender Notification - Benchtop Centrifuge
=====================================

**Government of Canada Tender Information**
----------------------------------------

### Tender Summary

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA), a federal department, is seeking proposals to supply benchtop centrifuges for laboratory use.

### Tender Overview

* **Procurement Reference Number:** cb-41-72429647
* **Amendment Number:** 4 (as of the date of tender closure)
* **Solicitation Number:** 2024-00185
* **Publication Date:** November 10, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 1, 2023, at 4:00 pm EST
* **Tender Status:** Expired (Expired)

### Bid Submission Guidelines

All bidders must ensure they have read and understood all the bid requirements and instructions thoroughly before submitting their proposals. Proposals must be submitted electronically via [Canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca) and must be received by the tender closing date.

### Tender Description

The CFIA is seeking proposals for the supply of two benchtop centrifuges for laboratory use. These centrifuges will be used for rotational processing of specimens at a variety of speeds.

### Trade Agreements and Contracting Entity Information

* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA):** This procurement is subject to the CFTA.
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Canadian Food Inspection Agency
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 59 Camelot Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0Y9

### End User Information

The end user of the benchtop centrifuges will be the CFIA's scientists and researchers at multiple locations within Thunder Bay and Sarnia.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries regarding this tender, please contact Xuan Zhang at (343) 575-4587 or via email at [xuan.zhang@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:xuan.zhang@inspection.gc.ca).

### Download the Tender Notice and Attachments

The tender notice and attachments (including detailed specifications and technical requirements) are available for download at the following URL [ attachment ](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24633/2024-00185-npp.pdf)
